docs.title: Hytale Formats Wiki
docs.text:
This is an Unofficial Hytale wiki documenting all of the games external file formats.

This wiki is early in development and is a work in progress so a lot of information will likely be missing or incorrect.

You can find the pages for information you want by either using the search bar at the top right or the navigation bar on the left.

docs.title: Chunk format
docs.text: Chunks store the terrain and entities within a 32×320×32 area in the world. They also store precomputed lighting, heightmap data for Hytale's performance, and other meta information.

docs.title: Binary Structure
docs.text:
Name Size (in bytes) Description Magic 20 Identifies the Hytale region. Always HytaleIndexedStorage Version 4 The version of the format used to save this region. Currently always 1. Blob Count 4 Currently always 1024. Segment Size 4 Currently always 4096. Blob Array Blob Count * 4 The blob int array.

(To be continued)

docs.title: Block format
docs.text:
Block positions are ordered YZX for compression purposes.

The coordinate system is as follows:

  • X increases East, decreases West
  • Y increases upward, decreases downward
  • Z increases South, decreases North

This means indices are ordered like in a book, with its top to the North, read from beneath and with words written backward: each letter is a different X-index, each line a Z-index, and each page a Y-index. In case of a flat 2D array, the Y-index is omitted, and the array reads like a single page.

Each section is a 32×32×32-block area, with up to 10 sections in a chunk : from 0 at the bottom, to 31 on top. Empty sections are not saved.

You can calculate the index for a chunk section one of the following ways:

(Simple index) index = (y * 32 + z) * 32 + x

(Advanced index. loops over when out of bounds) index = (y & 31) << 10 | (z & 31) << 5 | x & 31

docs.title: History
docs.text:
Early Access

2026.01.13-dcad8778f The chunk format is introduced. Chunks are divided into 10 individual 32×32×32 block sections.

docs.title: Level format
docs.text: Each level is its own folder. A level folder itself (can be empty) is how the game identifies a level, along with other subfolders to store the maps and regions of the level.

docs.title: Directory structure
docs.text:
This is the directory structure of the Hytale/Saves folder, where the game saves the entire world data:

  • : A world directory.
    • log
      • <yyyy>-<mm>-<dd>_<HH>-<MM>-<SS>_server.log
    • mods: Stores the installed mods that are used with this world.
      • Hytale_Shop
        • barter_shop_state.json
    • universe
      • players: Stores the individual states of the players that have played in this world.
        • <uuid>.json: A json file of the player. See Player.json format.
      • worlds
        • default: The default world, normally Orbis.
          • chunks: Stores region files of the world.
            • <x>.<z>.region.bin: A region file. See Chunk format.
          • resources
            • BlockCounter.json
            • BlockMapMarkers.json
            • InstanceData.json
            • PrefabEditSession.json
            • ReputationData.json
            • SpawnSuppressionController.json
            • Time.json
          • config.json
      • memories.json
    • bans.json
    • config.json
    • permissions.json
    • preview.png
    • whitelist.json

docs.title: History
docs.text:
Early Access

2026.01.13-dcad8778f To Be Determined

docs.title: player.json format
docs.text: <player>.json files are used to store the state of individual players. These files are in Json format.

docs.title: Json Structure
docs.text:
Show
  • : Root object.
    • Components:
      • Nameplate:
        • Text: The players name.
      • EffectController:
      • ObjectiveHistory:
        • ObjectiveHistory:
        • ObjectiveLineHistory:
      • DisplayName:
        • DisplayName:
          • RawText: The players name.
          • Bold:
          • Italic:
          • Monospace:
          • Underline:
      • UIComponentList:
      • Transform:
        • Position:
          • X:
          • Y:
          • Z:
        • Rotation:
          • Pitch:
          • Yaw:
          • Roll:
      • BuilderTools:
        • SelectionHistory:
      • Velocity:
        • Velocity:
          • X:
          • Y:
          • Z:
      • Player
        • Version:
        • UUID:
          • $binary:
          • $type:
        • Inventory:
          • Version:
          • Storage:
            • Id:
            • Capacity:
            • Items:
              • <#>:
                • Id:
                • Quantity:
                • Durability:
                • MaxDurability:
                • OverrideDropItemAnimation:
          • Armor:
            • Id:
            • Capacity:
            • Items:
              • <#>:
                • Id:
                • Quantity:
                • Durability:
                • MaxDurability:
                • OverrideDropItemAnimation:
          • HotBar:
            • Id:
            • Capacity:
            • Items:
              • <#>:
                • Id:
                • Quantity:
                • Durability:
                • MaxDurability:
                • OverrideDropItemAnimation:
          • Utility:
            • Id:
            • Capacity:
            • Items:
              • <#>:
                • Id:
                • Quantity:
                • Durability:
                • MaxDurability:
                • OverrideDropItemAnimation:
          • Backpack:
            • Id:
            • Capacity:
            • Items:
              • <#>:
                • Id:
                • Quantity:
                • Durability:
                • MaxDurability:
                • OverrideDropItemAnimation:
          • ActiveHotbarSlot:
          • Tool:
            • Id:
            • Capacity:
            • Items:
              • <#>:
                • Id:
                • Quantity:
                • Durability:
                • MaxDurability:
                • OverrideDropItemAnimation:
          • ActiveToolsSlot:
          • ActiveUtilitySlot:
          • SortType:
        • PlayerData:
          • BlockIdVersion:
          • World:
          • KnownRecipes:
          • PerWorldData:
            • instance-<Zone_Name>-<uuid>:
              • LastPosition:
                • X:
                • Y:
                • Z:
                • Pitch:
                • Yaw:
                • Roll:
              • LastMovementStates:
                • Flying:
              • FirstSpawn:
              • DeathPositions:
                • : A death position.
                  • MarkerId:
                  • Transform:
                    • X:
                    • Y:
                    • Z:
                    • Pitch:
                    • Yaw:
                    • Roll:
                  • Day:
          • DiscoveredZones:
            • : A zone the player has discoverd.
          • DiscoveredInstances:
            • : A discovered instance.
              • $binary:
              • $type:
          • ReputationData:
          • ActiveObjectiveUUIDs:
        • BlockPlacementOverride:
        • HotbarManager:
          • SavedHotbars:
            • : A saved hotbar row.
              • Id:
              • Capacity:
              • Items:
                • <#>:
                  • Id:
                  • Quantity:
                  • Durability:
                  • MaxDurability:
                  • OverrideDropItemAnimation:
          • CurrentHotbar:
        • GameMode:
      • Invulnerable:
      • HitboxCollision:
        • HitboxCollisionConfigIndex:
      • UniqueItemUsages:
        • UniqueItemUsed:
      • Instance:
      • UUID:
        • UUID:
          • $binary:
          • $type:
      • EntityStates:
        • Version:
        • Stats:
          • <stat>:
            • Id:
            • Value:
      • CreativeHub:
        • ParentHubWorldUuid:
      • HeadRotation:
        • Rotation:
          • Pitch:
          • Yaw:
          • Roll:

docs.title: Inventory slot numbers
docs.text:
The image below shows the slot numbers of the player's inventory slots as of Hytale 2026.01.13-dcad8778f.

The gray names reflect what each inventory section is called in the json.

docs.title: History
docs.text:
Early Access

2026.01.13-dcad8778f The player format is introduced.

docs.title: Version history
docs.text: Hytale has been in constant development since 2015 and first released publicly in early access on January 13, 2026.

Early Access was the initial development phase of Hytale released to the public.

Version Revision Type 2026.01.13 dcad8778f initial release 50e69c385 hotfix

docs.title: Hytale 2026.01.13-50e69c385
docs.text: 2026.01.13-50e69c385 is a hotfix update released on January 13th, 2026,[1] which addresses the most critical issues reported since launch.

docs.title: Connectivity
docs.text:
• Added message after server boot if authentication is required.
  • Client now switches to offline mode when session becomes invalid.

docs.title: Stability
docs.text:
• Fixed a crash that could occur when selecting certain hair styles followed by eyebrows in character creation.
  • Fixed a crash when taking screenshots for people with non-English folder names.
  • Fixed an issue preventing our Norwegian friends from launching the game.
  • Fixed a crash when using buckets. This broke some workbenches, they will need to be destroyed and placed back down to resolve the issue.
  • Preventing left mouse button from being bound to some actions.
  • General stability improvements.

docs.title: Launcher
docs.text:
• Added a warning to inform players if their computer time is out of date. This fixes certain authentication issues.
  • Fixed an authentication issue that happened sporadically when logging in.

docs.title: Services
docs.text:
• Patched a vulnerability that allowed players to spoof their username. (purely visual)
  • Improved caching of game patches globally.
  • Improved email sending service to handle larger volumes of emails.

docs.title: References
docs.text: 1. "Hotfixes: 13 January 2026" -- Hytale.com, January 13, 2026.
